page.title: 02EAST GRINSTEAD HOUSING
page.content: This block encompasses great contrast in housing styles. In the High St well preserved 14C houses still stand behind their narrow facades. 15, 16 & 17C timber framed houses have become shops and offices. In Portland Rd Edwardian houses are rarely available, but many take in lodgers. West Lane has secluded character properties always in demand at the highest prices. Around dunnings Rd smaller houses of the 1920s & 30s often have their original occupants, whilst others have been modernised by Do It Yourself enthusiasts. At Herontye the builders won awards for their modern design. Even the plants in the front gardens were planned. The 1970s flats & 2 bedroom houses sell for around $46000 while some 4 bedroom executive detached houses can reach $95000.
